description: Quamzin is a brilliant but mentally unstable Zentradi commander during Space War I. He appears in the 1984 film http://anidb.net/a996 [The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?] as a Zentradi commander who attacks and critically damages http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Roy Focker]`s Valkyrie aboard http://anidb.net/ch49046 [Vrlitwhai]`s ship. During the melee, http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker] shoots him in the back, and both die when http://anidb.net/ch10505 [Focker]`s Valkyrie explodes. (Quamzin is unnamed in the dialogue, but listed in the ending credits and script as "Quamzin 03350").Source: wiki
name: Quamzin 03350
